content: the mustard puff crochet infinity scarf boasts a sophisticated texture but is deceptively easy to make the crisscross texture of the puff row almost gives this scarf a cabled vibe but with much less work and i think the raised braids super easy to do by just working the the 3rd loop of the hdcs adds a nice contrast the front and back of the piece are very slightly different but both sides are equally gorgeous - making it totally reversible this crochet infinity scarf is a great project if you are ready to move beyond basic stitches but aren t quite up to intricate stitch patterns or increasing and decreasing it is worked in row lengthwise to form a long skinny rectangle which is then seamed together easy peasy visit www knottednest com for the free version of this pattern pattern download - please note this listing is for the pattern only - pattern is written in us terms - pattern includes written instructions and step-by-step pictures that are located at the end of the pattern so they can be easily omitted for printing - this pattern will be delivered via email in the form of a digital file pdf upon purchase skill level easy - level 2 sizing written for medium adult but length can be easily adjusted measures 60 long before seaming and 7 wide share your work follow along on instagram at @theknottednest tag @theknottednest and use the #mustardpuffscarf hashtag to show off your new project copyright the mustard puff infinity scarf pattern and photographs are property of the knotted nest and are for personal non-commercial use only you may not alter share or sell this pattern in any way however you are welcome to sell the finished product that you make using this pattern please credit the knotted nest by including a link to the pattern listing if selling the finished piece online
